格式：
报文头（2） flag（1） ID（4） R/W（1） length（2） data（n） crc8（1） 报文尾（2）

主动发送：
0x00.心跳包：
A5 A5 00 D5 2D DE 17 00 00 00 0D 5A 5A 

0x06.刷卡：
A5 A5 06 D5 2D DE 17 00 00 03 79 A3 8E 1D 5A 5A 
A5 A5 06 D5 2D DE 17 00 00 03 79 21 45 49 5A 5A

交互命令：
0x01.读写DS1302
读取：
发送：A5 A5 01 D5 2D DE 17 00 00 05 00 00 00 00 00 49 5A 5A
返回：A5 A5 01 D5 2D DE 17 00 00 05 11 0B 03 0B 27 E2 5A 5A 

写入：
A5 A5 01 D5 2D DE 17 00 00 05 11 0B 03 0B 2B E2 5A 5A
失败：A5 A5 01 D5 2D DE 17 01 00 01 AA C3 5A 5A 
成功：A5 A5 01 D5 2D DE 17 01 00 01 55 F6 5A 5A

0x02.本地网络配置(端口固定6000，不能修改)
读取：
发送：A5 A5 02 D5 2D DE 17 00 00 06 00 00 00 00 00 00 49 5A 5A
返回：A5 A5 02 D5 2D DE 17 00 00 06 C0 A8 01 64 17 70 C0 5A 5A 

写入：
发送：A5 A5 02 D5 2D DE 17 01 00 06 C0 A8 01 66 17 70 C1 5A 5A 
返回：A5 A5 02 D5 2D DE 17 01 00 01 55 03 5A 5A

0x03.服务器网络配置
读取：
发送：A5 A5 03 D5 2D DE 17 00 00 06 00 00 00 00 00 00 49 5A 5A
返回：A5 A5 03 D5 2D DE 17 00 00 06 C0 A8 01 96 1F 90 B1 5A 5A  

写入：
发送：A5 A5 03 D5 2D DE 17 01 00 06 C0 A8 01 C8 1F 91 B1 5A 5A  
返回：A5 A5 03 D5 2D DE 17 01 00 01 55 03 5A 5A


0x04.读写所有的卡号
读取：
发送：A5 A5 04 D5 2D DE 17 00 00 00 B1 5A 5A 
返回：A5 A5 04 D5 2D DE 17 00 01 FE 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 79 A3 8E 25 5A 5A  

写入：
发送：A5 A5 04 D5 2D DE 17 01 01 FE 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 79 21 45 79 A3 8E 25 5A 5A  
返回：A5 A5 04 D5 2D DE 17 01 00 01 55 F0 5A 5A

7.读取时间记录信息
读取：
发送：A5 A5 05 D5 2D DE 17 00 00 02 00 03 25 5A 5A(从第0页开始)
返回：A5 A5 05 D5 2D DE 17 01 01 00 79 A3 8E 11 0A 1F 0E 16 79 A3 8E 11 0A 1F 0E 16 79 A3 8E 11 0A 1F 0E 16 79 A3 8E 11 0A 1F 0E 1D 79 A3 8E 11 0B 03 0A 12 79 A3 8E 11 0B 03 0C 21 79 A3 8E 11 0B 03 0C 25 79 A3 8E 11 0B 03 0C 25 79 A3 8E 11 0B 03 0C 25 79 A3 8E 11 0B 03 0C 25 79 A3 8E 11 0B 03 0C 25 79 A3 8E 11 0B 03 0C 25 79 A3 8E 11 0B 03 0C 25 79 A3 8E 11 0B 03 0C 25 79 A3 8E 11 0B 03 0C 25 79 A3 8E 11 0B 03 0C 25 79 A3 8E 11 0B 03 0C 25 79 A3 8E 11 0B 03 0C 25 79 A3 8E 11 0B 03 0C 26 79 A3 8E 11 0B 03 0C 26 79 A3 8E 11 0B 03 0C 2A 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 46 5A 5A
